title: Serious Sam 3 BFE Jewel of the Nile-=AviaRa=-
description:
Minimum system requirements

OS: Windows XP/Vista/7
CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.0 Ghz, AMD Athlon 64 X2 4200+   
RAM: 1 GB
Graphics: nVidia GeForce 7800, ATI Radeon X1900
HDD: 4 GB
DirectX: 9.0

Recommended system requirements

OS: Windows 7
CPU: Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad @ 2.4 GHz, AMD Phenom II X4 @ 2.6 GHz   
RAM: 4 GB
Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 480, ATI Radeon HD 6990
HDD: 4 GB
DirectX: 11

UPDATE VIDEO DRIVERS TO THE LATEST VERSION, IF YOU DON`T THE GAME WON`T WORK

DESCRiPTiON

BFE:

Serious Sam 3: BFE is a glorious throwback to the golden
age of first-person shooters where men were men
cover was for amateurs and pulling the trigger made
things go boom. Serving as a prequel to the original
indie sensation, Serious Sam: The First Encounter
Serious Sam 3 takes place during the Earth s final
struggle against Mental s invading legions of beasts
and mercenaries. Set against the collapsing temples of
an ancient civilization and the crumbling cities of 22nd
century Egypt, Serious Sam 3 is an exhilarating fusion
of classic twitch shooters and modern gameplay features
NO COVER. ALL MAN

JEWEL OF THE NiLE:

Serious Sam 3: Jewel of the Nile follows the legendary
hero to the mysterious Temple of Isis on the Island
of Philae where a monstrous temple guardian lies in
wait. Set in the midst of the events in Serious Sam 3:
BFE,Sam and his team will battle through three new
campaign missions against the unrelenting hordes of
Mental s forces
